title: Headed for Trouble
description: 10 hours, 26 minutes New York Times bestselling author Suzanne Brockmann, whom USA Today calls “the reigning queen of military suspense,” breaks out a rapid-fire collection of pulse-pounding, heart-tugging stories and novellas featuring the intrepid men and women of Troubleshooters Inc., fiction’s hottest ultimate counterterrorism squad. Tough-as-nails Troubleshooters operative Sam Starrett learns the agony of loving someone in danger—and the hell of waiting on the home front—as his wife, Alyssa, hurtles into a foreign hotspot that’s about to boil over. Navy SEAL Frank O’Leary’s ill-fated holiday reunion with his older brother takes a turn for the better—when a chance encounter on a rainy New Orleans street gives Frank a reason to be thankful after all. In a maze of tunnels deep beneath a military base in Germany, Jules Cassidy, Alyssa Locke, and their comrades in arms match wits with terrorists on a mission with explosive consequences.Plus more never-before-released adventures featuring Jenk, Izzy, Gillman, Lopez, Kenny, Savannah, and other members of SEAL Team 16—along with Suzanne Brockmann’s exclusive interviews with her beloved characters.Looking for the best kind of trouble? You’ve found it!Story ListWhen Frank Met RosieWhen Alyssa and Sam Met the DentistWaitingSam Takes an Assignment in ItalyWhen Jenk, Izzy, Gilman & Lopez Met Tony Vlachic TrappedHome is Where the Heart IsA Seal and Three BabiesValentines DayOtherThoughts on When Frank Met RosieInterview with Tom & KellyConversation with Jenk, Gilman, Lopez & IzzyInterview with Kenny & Savannah FAQ’S Answered
author: Suzanne Brockmann
